name: Penguin Ice Crush Survivor 3D
description:
In this cold winter full of surprises and magical things play a new advance idea puzzle game " Penguin Ice Crush Survivor 3D" in which a cute Penguin is stuck on top of some piled solid Ice Rocks in a ice snowy environment. In this game you have to help penguin and set free safely on ground. Tap different shaped ice rocks to clear Ice cubes and lower the penguin to land safely. Try now and get in love with this entertaining addictive puzzle action game the "Penguin Ice Crush Survivor 3D". Its party time have fun !
Game Features:
Full 3D ice and snow game environment.
A must game play for this cold winter.
Easy user friendly menu navigation.
Excellent 3D Graphics.
Multi touch screen control.
Challenging levels with interesting block arrangements.
Perfectly tuned physics engine.
Addictive Game Play.
Simple yet addictive awesome brain game indeed.
For all type of players age: Kids, teens and adult in family.
Developed in popular Unity Pro 3D Engine.
